Header: Woman Soldiers Listen to Pertinent Lecture
Content: An educative lecture on 'Young Age and Woman Soldierâ€™ was delivered to the troops of 1 Sri Lanka Women's Corps (SLAWC) on Thursday (14) at the SLAWC Regimental centre in Borella. Lieutenant Colonel B.G.S Samanthi of National Cadets Corps (NCC) on the directions of   the Directorate of Psychological Operations at the AHQ spoke on the subject. 100 plus troops including several Officers listened to the lecture.
